reuters.title: OLIVER'S STORES <OLVR> FILES CHAPTER 11
reuters.body: Oliver's Stores Inc said it has decided to reorganize under Chapter 11 of the federal bankruptcy laws and will file a petition by the end of this week. The company said it has failed to reach agreement with primary lenders Manufacturers Hanover Corp <MHC> and Midlantic Corp <MIDL> on a debt restructuring. It said Manufacturers has declared the company in default and demanded repayment of about six mln dlrs in debt. Reuter 
